subitem_title: Application No. 3-14-1613 (Fort Ord Dunes State Park Campground, Monterey Co.)

(MW-SC)

item_blurb: Report by Chief of Enforcement on Statewide Enforcement Program. (LAH-SF)

item_title: Consent Cease and Desist Order No. CCC-17-CD-02 (RMC Pacific Materials, LLC, d/b/a CEMEX, Marina, Monterey Co.)
item_blurb: Public hearing and Commission action on proposed consent administrative order directing property owner and mine operator to, among other things: 1) cease, within agreed upon time period, sand extraction on property pursuant to approved cessation plan; 2) remove dredges, equipment associated with dredges, pump stations and other facilities from property pursuant to approved removal plan; 3) cease further unpermitted grading and changes in intensity of use of property; 4) undertake reclamation of property and protect sensitive species on site; and 5) transfer property to approved non-profit or governmental entity for conservation and potential public access and passive recreation purposes; on property located near Lapis Rd., APNs 203-011-019, 203-011-001-000, 203-011-016-000, and 203-011-020-000, City of Marina, Monterey County. (JB-SF)

(KK-SC)

(BO-SC)
